ObjectData.Name: DisplayUser
ObjectData.Description: An interface for displaying list of users in the list.

ObjectData.Name: .ctor
ObjectData.Description: This contructor sets the properties and the value entered in the parameter of the contructor
ObjectData.Input: This constructor takens in user information [Id, Name, Address, Gender, Religion and returns
ObjectData.Output: User information accordingly as a string.

ObjectData.Name: ID
ObjectData.Description: This is the id of user.

ObjectData.Name: Name
ObjectData.Description: This properties is the Name of user.

ObjectData.Name: Address
ObjectData.Description: This properties is the Address of user

ObjectData.Name: Gender
ObjectData.Description: This properties is the gender of user

ObjectData.Name: Religion
ObjectData.Description: This properties is the country where the user comes from

ObjectData.Name: DisplayUser
ObjectData.Description: This method adds the new user to the list and also display the user on the console.

ObjectData.Name: MetaData
ObjectData.Description: This class holds all the implementation of getting information about the metat data.

ObjectData.Name: GetDocs
ObjectData.Description: This method return the all the description and information in the assemblies illustrated by the default attribute.

ObjectData.Name: .ctor
ObjectData.Input: It accepts three overloads. [description, input and output]
ObjectData.Output: It returns the value of each properties.
